titleStmt.title: Two speeches in Parliament the one concerning religion, and fit men to be chosen for the Assemblie : the other concerning a West Indie Association at a Committee of the whole House in the Parliament / by Sir Benjamin Rudyerd.
titleStmt.author: Rudyerd, Benjamin, Sir, 1572-1658.
